text:
OurPeople | Angular/Frontend developer | Bristol, UK | Full-time ONSITE 2-3 days a week REMOTE the rest of the time | www.ourpeople.co.uk/careers/

We are looking for a talented JavaScript Engineer to join our growing Team. Use your extensive knowledge of JavaScript, HTML and CSS to improve on both the Our People Web Console and Mobile App. You will collaborate closely with the Senior Technical Lead, Design and QA to spec, build, test and deploy new features.
